section.p: Events are collected from Windows event logs through a WinRM subscription. Information encoded in Windows event classes is used to populate the following, standard event fields.
Events collected in this manner are timestamped with the time from the Windows event log, not the collection time.
section.note: This ZenPack generates an event with severity Info when an IIS Site is stopped. To assign a different severity level, create a transform. For more information, refer to .
